ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Generates a simple Ternary Scatter chart in code
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Generates a Ternary Scatter chart in code. The TernaryScatterRenderableSeries can be used to render an [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Model.DataSeries.XyzDataSeries%601.html']XyzDataSeries[/url].
The scatter chart uses the [url='http://support.scichart.com/index.php?/Knowledgebase/Article/View/17182/28/adding-data-pointmarkers']PointMarker API[/url] to define the marker shape and size. This can be customized in code or you can create your own Point-Markers using our [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.PointMarkers.SpritePointMarker.html']SpritePointMarker[/url] or [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.PointMarkers.BasePointMarker.html']BasePointMarker[/url] type.
